verses.name: Mark 15:27
verses.text: And with him they crucify two thieves; the one on his right hand, and the other on his left.

verses.name: Mark 15:28
verses.text: And the scripture was fulfilled, which saith, And he was numbered with the transgressors.

verses.name: Mark 15:29
verses.text: And they that passed by railed on him, wagging their heads, and saying, Ah, thou that destroyest the temple, and buildest it in three days,

verses.name: Mark 15:30
verses.text: Save thyself, and come down from the cross.

verses.name: Mark 15:31
verses.text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes, He saved others; himself he cannot save.
